content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down 65 south  headed to the county line road exit to go home, when i saw a disc shaped object,hovering in place about a mile south of greenwood municipal airport. it was disc shaped,dark in color(very deep shade of gray,and had 3 white lites flashing in sequence on the side i saw. it was about 600 ft. in the air, and from the distance i was away,i estimate it's size to be about 10 yards in diameter. i got off on th ecounty lin eroad exit,and headed south on emerson ave. trying to get closer. i kept it in veiw,till it went straight up in the air and disappeared. i saw alot of people in their cars looking at it as well.
i don't know what it was..But i do know it was not a plane of any sort.I watched the news that evening,as these things tend to get some air time here in the hoosier state,but no station ran anything. interestingly enough,that evening and the next day,there was alot of military helicopters flying over the area, and a bunch of military vehicles parked at the airport. when i first saw the object, i though maybe it was an ultralight,till i saw closer. it seemed to be about 8 feet thick, and made no noise. i was in complete awe,and thought " ain't nobody gonna believe this" till i saw how many others were looking at it. i lost sight when it flew straight up into the sky, and it flew fairly fast.
content.summary: Saw object in sky south of greenwood airport

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer afternoon clear sky no clouds at all i was just talking to my friend in front of my house about sports and at a distance in the same line of sight at which im taliking to my friend an object that came in from the left it was 1/2 mile out.  i passed it off thinking it was a plane or a balloon, so it was still moving left in the distant directory behind my friends head. then it just stoped making my conversation stoped when my friend looked at me and siad "yoh,what the hell are you looking at!" and to my surprise my other friend lance that was sitting on my porch saw the same thing i seen. when my friend that i was having the conversation with turned around he amediately understood what was going on because he saw our faces frozen. that is not even the amazing part, while lance and i staired at the disked shape object my friend that just turned around after stoping the converastion identified another simular object right above that i did no see. specificly at a right angle upward on the right side.  when all three of us realized that it was a ufo due to the stationary position with no noise thats when the objects slowy picked up and started moving away quickly and disapeared out of sight. till this day im still amazed because i live in the urban area and things like this just don't happen by chance. but that day it did.
content.summary: It was a clear sky and i was talking to a friend near my house and i thought there was a balloon off a distance behind my friend so i thought nothing of it until it stoped behind my friends head.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my cousin, and my mom and dad were tubing just outside of town at the hill where the double eagle 2 took of in 1976. i was at the top of the hill when a strange noise came from the sky it was a loud screatch, and a few seconds later a saucer appeard through the grey clouds it flew at about the speed an airplane would maybe a-little faster.It was disk shaped and was not lit it was probably 200-250 feet up. it flew over quite low making the buzz the whole time. it disapeard in the clouds a few seconds later.
content.summary: Saucer like moving at about speed of plane

content.detailedDescription:
I am a captain with a large us airline. this event occurred back in the early 90's and the exact time, place, date are approximate. i always wondered what i'd observed but never said anything due to my job, my reputation, and the fact that i wasn't sure what i really saw that day. it wasn't until today, when i happened upon a soviet mig 21 film that showed them chasing an object exactly like the one i saw, that i decided to tell someone about it.

i was a first officer on a md-80 aircraft flying across the midwest eastbound to chicago. it was the middle of the afternoon, early fall, and there were numerous scattered to broken cloud decks below us, and a higher stratus deck above. i think we were still in cruise flight, somewhere between 31000 to 35000 feet, somewhere over kansas or missouri. i remember it being not a bright day, sort of broken overcast as far as illumination goes. not a bright day, but not gray or gloomy.

the captain and i both noticed a black dot quite a ways ahead of us to the left, and lower. i think i made a comment about it, as it was a habit to call out any air traffic when we noticed it. both of us watched as the object came closer; our interest increasing mostly because it's coloring was so dark and it stood out quite well against the white puffy clouds below and ahead of us. as we approached, we could see that it wasn't another jet as we expected, but instead could clearly see a long, flat-black cylinder with squared off ends, maybe 3-5000 feet below us and traveling slowly in the opposite direction. it looked to be as large, or perhaps slightly longer and thicker than our aircraft. there were no markings or openings that i could see. 

both of us were sort of stunned by it's shape, mostly because of it's size and the fact that the ends were squared off and it appeared to be moving. my initial reaction was that it was some sort of odd balloon, but somehow moving at  speed opposite the jet stream. it passed behind us to our left and below, rather quickly. it seem to maintain the same speed, not accelerating or slowing. we queried atc about other traffic or weather balloons in our vicinity but they told us they had nothing on their scopes. both of us looked at each other and i think made some nervous jokes about what we had just seen, but due to a sort of unspoken creed of our profession, neither of us said much about it after that... i think more due to the fact that it was such an odd shape that neither wanted to bring up the "ufo" theory, at least not seriously. i had never heard of a ufo shaped like a cylinder before.

i have been a pilot for 35+ years, 19 years at this airline ( the last 6 years as captain), and a military pilot for 10 years prior to that. i am not one of those guys wearing a tin foil hat and seeing the mother ship in every cloud. i would best be described as a skeptic, until now. we don't talk publicly about these sorts of things. i have only mentioned this quietly to one or two people since that time, and only as one of those stories where you couldn't figure out what you saw. it wasn't until today, when i saw that mig 21 video on the internet that i was shocked back to that moment, literally stunned, and realized that the object in the video was the exact same thing i had witnessed. it bothered me enough to report it to you, though i doubt it will help much since it was so long ago and my details are a bit fuzzy.

i hope you will keep my name, email and phone numbers confidential. my company would definitely frown on this being connected to me or their company.

this is the link to the video:

http://video.Google.Ca/videoplay?Docid=-4468185100897567649
content.summary: Airline sighting of black cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my front yard in escondido, ca. and noticed what i thought was the iss. it was much brighter and larger looking and i went to get my 8 year old son to look at it with me. when we came back out (5-8 second later)the object moving south was just passing over our house when two more objects came out of the bottom of the original object, on like a beam of light and started to move southwest and become almost as bright as the first object. one of the objects that came out of the first object
then ejected another object the same as the first, only one object came out instead of two and it faded out in a few seconds.The original object continued on it's southern path and the two objects moved away at a high rate of speed. five minutes later i saw military fighter type jets moving fast in the same heading almost the exact same position in the sky as the ufo(south)and then turn southwest. that is it. the moon is almost full and it is very bright tonight. clear skys and starry out.This took place on 01/01/07 at 8:27pm  it was maybe 4 to 6 thousand feet up in the skyand lasted about 6-8 minutes. please let me know if you know what the heck it was, my son,wife and i would like to know what it was. thank you, billy
content.summary: Thought it was the space station, but it was larger and brightermoving south. it had 2 objects desend out of the bottom also bright and moved southwest, turning from orange to red and getting brighter then dimmer, back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: Aparecio como a las 6:30  alado de la luna y se movia hacia el norte
content.summary: Muy grande y circular
content.locationName: Tlaltenango de S치nchez Rom치n Municipality, Zacatecas

content.detailedDescription:
My friend rick and i were returning from a concert at kent state university westbound on the ohio turnpike(i-80) around midnight and as we were about a mile from our exit(exit 8)he called my attention to an small bright light high in the sky whose behavior was inconsistent with any normal aircraft. it would zig-zag from north to south at an impossible speed coming to a dead stop for a second or two each time it changed direction. as we exited the highway, rick shouted "it's right over the car! pull over! pull over!" i did so at a spot about halfway to the tollbooth on an incline, and we both sprang from the car leaving the doors hanging open. unbeknownst to us, right behind us was an ohio state patrolman who also immediately pulled over(probably to ask us just what in the hell we were doing). he exited his cruiser, took a step or two towards us, and then probably due to the slack-jawed look on our faces, turned around to see what we were looking at.
moving west parallel to the interstate on the south side was the strangest thing i've ever seen. a large rectangular object which i would guess was about the size of a railroad boxcar was drifting along probably about 30 to 40 yards from us at an elevation just barely below level with our position on the higher embankment. it was traveling very slowly-maybe 10 to 15 mph-and was completely silent. there were a few small whiteish lights on its side allowing just enough illumination to make out its basic shape and its dark black/gray coloring. it then made a slight rumble/shudder sound followed by what sounded like a couple slight jettings of compressed air, though i couldn't pinpoint from where on the object the sounds came from. it appeared to accelerate somewhat and drifted out of view due to the adjacent terrain.
the patrolman spun around and gave us each a look(i'm told i don't have a good poker face-i imagine i looked somewhat stunned-i should have!),and without saying a word to either of us, climbed into his cruiser, turned on his flashers and sped through the toll-gates. i quickly paid the toll and we tried to see which way he'd gone. rick said" it's going that way!" pointing at the south side of the split and i took that. at the time i didn't know if he meant the cruiser or whatever the hell it was we'd just seen-i just took the southbound ramp that took us towards lake avenue as fast as i could. we shot up and down lake ave. a few times trying to see it again to no avail. what we did see though was one hell of alot of cops-sheriffs, local police, and state patrol all over the place. none of them pulled us over even though we were well exceeding the speed limit(and if you knew this area, considering the time of night, that in and of itself was about as strange as whatever we'd just seen!) after about 20 to 30 minutes we gave up and headed home.
was it the same object that we'd seen moving so fast overhead? who knows? it sure didn't look very aerodynamic, but i'd certainly think that it was somehow related. later in the week the local paper reported that the same and following night residents in the russia road area just southwest of there had reported strange things in the sky. i never saw anything like that again, but i'll certainly never forget it!
content.summary: Rectangular boxcar sized dark object with small whiteish lights on side

content.detailedDescription: Http://www.Chicagotribune.Com/classified/automotive/columnists/chi-0701010141jan01,0,5874175.Column?Coll=chi-newsnationworldiraq-hed
content.summary: Have you seen this story

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling west on i-10 coming out from el paso to los angeles
i first noticed the object about ten minutes before i told my wife it seemed strange to me because it was a fairly large object it seemed to be metallic and very heavy but it was not moving just stayed stationary over the same spot the whole time at first i thought it was a plane but it had no movement then maybe a helocopter but theres no rotors finally i settled on it being a blimp 
but it seemed to massive to be one i asked my wife what she thought of it and what shape she thought it was she said it was a circular shape and seemed heavy and made of metal. i agreed that it was circular because all this time we are still traveling westbound on the freeway the object did not move but always had a cigar shape to me which meant it was indeed circular
finally afetr driving about 20 mins and fearing loosing sight of the object i pulled off in the center dividing strip and took 4 photos and a short video with my fuji f20 digital camara, the strange thing is looking on the photos the object seems smaller than i remember it and on the video i cant see it at all after snapping the photos we left loosing it behind some hills 
i regret not driving towards it to find out what it really was but we had a long drive ahead of us 
if you could please let me know any info you have on this i would apprieciate you letting me know
content.summary: Cigar shaped object over deming new mexico

content.detailedDescription:
I apologize for not being able to report this sooner, as our home phone lines have been out for over a week, and we unfortunately have dial-up.   
 
   it was wednesday morning, december 20, 2006. i had an apppintment with a local car dealership, as i am leasing my vehicle, so there was a lease-pull-ahead going on, and my truck qualified, not to mention i had alot of other errands and last minute christmas shopping to finish. i told my daughters that instead of riding the bus to school, i would drive them. it was starting out to be a gorgeous day, as the sun was coming up, and the sky was absolutely beautiful and blue...Not a cloud in the sky, not to mention unseasonably warm for michigan this time of year. 
    we left our house at approximately 7:15am, and i drove my older daughter to her high school, and dropped her off. as i headed east on saginaw hwy, towards my younger daughters school, as we neared the intersection at nixon rd, we both noticed a large bright roundish white light in the north, just a few hundred feet over the woods. we turned north onto nixon rd, and noticed the light still there. at this time, the sky is so blue, and cloudless where we were. i drove north until we pulled into the school lot, we looked, and now the object is lower, and is over the woods directly across (west) from the school now. it just looked like a huge round whitish light in the sky. i wanted to pull over and take pictures, but the school and parking lot is so busy with traffic, and i didn't want to draw attention and have parents think i was taking pics of their kids. i watched my daughter walk into the building, and then pulled out of the lot, now heading south on nixon rd. at the intersection, i turned east once again onto saginaw hwy and headed for the i-96 freeway, which was about 3 miles form where i was at that point. i looked and the object was now gone, nowhere in sight. i looked at my cellphone clock...It was now 7:40am.
    i got onto the i-96 eastbound ramp, as i was heading for shaheen chevrolet in lansing/holt area. for a about 5 miles, i-96 eastbound actually heads in a southerly direction, until you pass the i-69 (ft. wayne) interchange, then i-96 heads east. as i went past the i-69 interchange, i notice in the far east...Ever-so-slightly north, a big solid white aircraft, like a jumbo 747 with a contrail, and it appeared to be heading west. it was just so bright white against the beautiful, clear blue sky. it was pretty to see. as i drove east, i kept watch of this aircraft. as i drove another 5 miles, this aircraft was still there, as was the contrail, and then it seemed it didn't appear to be moving. i assumed this was due to the distance away it was form me, and that it just gave the "illusion" it wasn't moving, since i was heading east and this was heading west. i continued to watch this aircraft the remainder of the way towards shaheen chevrolet. now i was directly south of the aircraft...It still had a contrail, & that's when i noticed...The aircraft wasn't moving. it just hung there in the sky, with this contrail behind it. i wanted to pull over immediately and take video/pictures of this, but this is not a safe place to just stop along the freeway at this point, because of all the exiting traffic. as i turned onto the cedar st. exit ramp, i kept watch. this was the exit i always took to shaheen chevrolet/sam's club/celebration cinema theaters/etc. there is a stoplight at the end of this exit ramp, and it was red. as i stopped, i glanced up at the aircraft (which is just barely west of me now) and suddenly this other white object just 'appears" out of the clear blue sky, and is under/lower the original aircraft. now...It too is just sitting there in the sky. 
    my husband is self-employed and his warehouse/office is located in holt, approximately 3 miles southeast of where i was at. i quickly got on my cellphone and called him. i asked him if he was at his office...Which he replied yes. i then asked him to quickly step outside and look into the north sky, and tell me what he sees. i told him to hurry. the light turned green and i am still driving at this point as this is a major intersection with many inter-connecting streets...A very high-traffic area, and i can't just pull over. as i finally get to near the dealership, i pull over into the sam"s club parking lot, that is adjacent to shaheen chevrolet and wilx tv-10 station. the aircraft is still just sitting there. my husband says he sees an aircraft...I ask him what color...And if he sees the contrail...I then ask him if he sees anything else, and i tell him to look very closely...Then he sees the other whiteish object below. i then ask him if it appears to be moving, he said no, and he says it's probably just a trick of the eyes, then very quickly i explained that i had watched this all the way from grand ledge, and how i too thought it was a trick of the eyes, until i got closer. then...Suddenly, the lower craft object starts moving, and quickly passes this huge aircraft. (it was like you were watching a little 4 seater plane pass a huge jumbojet...It just doesn't happen). i said...Its moving now...Do you see it?...He confirmed yes. i told him i had to go, as i could not hang onto my cell & talk and i had to quickly take pics/video....I then hung up. 
    i stepped out of my truck and tried so hard to get the video to focus, but because of the bright blue cloudless sky, and the sun, there was nothing for it to keep a good focus on and not blur. i tried everything, so i then switched it to picture mode, and managed to get 15 pictures of this. it still did not want to focus good at all, especially when i tried to zoom in on them. in 4 of the pictures, i zoomed out, so as to capture tree-tops and part of a sam's club parking lot light, for distance/size comparison. i could not take any more pictures, as you could no longer see them. 
    i then pulled into shaheen, and went into the sales rep's office. while there, after a little bit, i remembering glancing at the clock, and thinking wow...Time went so fast. i had so much to do, so i told him i had to get going. i didn't download the pictures 'till a few days later. when i noticed the time on the pictures.....They show the first picture taken at 8:45am..And the last picture taken at 8:47am. the entire distance from my youngest daughters school, to shaheen chevrolet is 13.16 miles according to mapquest., with a driving time of 16 minutes. it shows taking m-99 exit, but i always go to the next exit (cedar st), which is approx another 2-3 miles east. i am missing alot of time, and yet can not remember anything being out of place...Besides witnessing the bright whitish objects...1 at the school, and the 1 under the large aircraft. 
 
what i find very odd, is the fact that i could see this large aircraft very clearly for the entire time. it was the most beautiful white against the very blue cloudless sky. i could see the wings, engines, tail section, everything. then the smaller very bright white object appears below it...Also very white, but i could not discern a clear definite shape/object. it looked like a very white blur/orb if you will. and the way they both just sat there in the sky, then suddenly the small object starts moving as well as the larger aircraft, and yet the small object is able to pass it, does not make sense in conventional terms, as i know them. 
 
i have attached 3 pics...1st is "original", 2nd is "labeled" 3rd is "inverted colors" (dark is light, light is dark), so you can see how even the large aircraft just doesn't seem to show hardly at all in the pics...Yet this is not how my husband & i both saw it. when we saw it, it was plain as day a large aircraft, and a very white smaller blur/orb. remember when i took these pics, the objects were now moving. you will definitely have to zoom in to see to see clearly. also remember when i first noticed a whiteish objectin the morning, was a few minutes before i noted the time as 7:40am. the 7:40 incident was in eaton county, the 2nd incident was in ingham county.
 
patty d
mufon int'l fi &
michigan mufon fi (clinton county)
content.summary: Object appears below large aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out trash and noticed a pulsating orange object in thesky.I looked at it for a few seconds and then it was if someone was dimming a light and then it disappeared right in front of my eyes.It was like nothing i have ever seen before.It made no noise at all.Fr om what i saw, it was not a craft of this earth. it was amazing. it definatley was not a man made craft and if it was the government is hiding things from us again like usual.They need to finally come clean and let us know what is going on.
content.summary: Large spherical object:pulsating orange in color then dimmed out like a light and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was december 28, 2006 i was walking home from my friends house it was about four fourty p.M. and i saw a object in the sky and cigar shaped. it was also red and white it was weird because it didnt have any wings. but iknow it wasnt a blimp. this is my second time reporting a ufo and plus ive been seeing a lot of strange things coming fom the noth whic dayton ohio is north and which is where wright patterson airforce base is. as i said in the other report where i saw a different ufo, my great uncle lester worked at wright patterson and only told us that there was other life out there and if he said anything else he said that he would be court marshalled. it could be something human but i cant think of anything else other then a missile but it was traveling to slow to be one.At first i thought it was a plane but thats when i noticed it had no wings. it was coming from the north where wright patterson air force base os and it was moving south.I lost sight of it after chasing it on foot.
content.summary: I was walking home from my friends house and saw this strange object without wings not a blimp and it was red and white like a missile but traveling to slow.

content.detailedDescription: It was about eleven thirty p.M. on december 30, 2006. i went to take my two dogs out and i saw one light moving in the sky and at first i thought it was just a flood light, i went in and came back out. it then went to 3lights then to 4 and 5 lights. it sounds strange but you could see it move north(my right) then back south(my left) then it went right and you wouldnt see it come back left but would start back from the left and go right and see it go back leftthen right but you wouldnt see it come back left and start over. it sounds weird but two days before i saw something even stranger which i will report in a different sighting on this website. ill tell you about that in the next one. but my family arent strangers to ufos. my grandpa told me that two of my great uncles my great uncle charlie and great uncle lester were involved in the military and one was invoved in space recovery and he suposevly was involved in the roswell incedent recovery. also lester worked at right field now known as wright patterson airforce base in dayton ohio. he never told us anyhting but that there is other life out there because if he said anything more he would be court marshelled. but any way they were circilur and were bright lights. they could be flood lights but it was awfully bright for how far back it was. and it looked like that it had something solid behind the lights. but thats the truth and it was what my family and i saw.It lasted for 1 hour and 42 minutes.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a light then to 4 or 5 lights moving back and fowarth but it was in a pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
Sightseeing and taking photographs along coast north of santa cruz california. on back road just south of bonny doon, took photo of picturesque landscape. camera was pointing approximately east. did not see any object in sky.

camera was hewlett packard photosmart r967, 10 megapixels, in auto mode. shutter speed for ambient lighting conditions varied somewhat for different scenes, but was hovering around 1/400 second. 

several hours later, looking at image on computer screen, noticed dark oval object just above trees. another photo of the same landscape, taken at the same time but panned several degrees to the left, shows nothing. 

attached photo is untouched image taken directly from sd card in camera. no manipulation or alteration of any kind. 

john tisdale
content.summary: Object not seen in real time. noticed later on computer screen.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving through a parking lot at walmart and noticed a few people looking up and pointing at the sky. after arriving at my house a short distance further, we looked up at the sky and noticed a black triangular object floating high just east of golden. at first we thought it may be some giant kite with very high altitude, but after looking through binoculars the object was unwavering. it stayed in one single spot for over a half hour. the sun started to go down and we kept the object in view of the binoculars. using a small star as a reference point, the object began to rise a fall extremely fast around the star. it climbed once again and was stationary until the sun went down. it almost looked like a hovering, stationary, black, stealth fighter. it was large, but even in the binoculars it had not definite details on its outer shell. very strange, but a very interesting first encounter.
content.summary: Black triangular object over golden

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the army in the early 70s.I was stationed at fort monroe.I had started to get into photography and i was at an amusemant park just a short walk from where i was renting.The park was a great place to hang out on a weekend night.I was taking pictures of the lights and all of the familys that were there.A guy came up and shook my shoulder and said i should take a picture of that.I looked over my shoulder and saw a bright white ball of light moving across the sky.I did not get my camera up because i was stunned by the site.It flew passed me and was gone before i could move.

it was reported in the news up and down the eastern states and had been seen  and reported many people.

i'm 53 now.I have seen many effects of light on windows and outside over the years.I think alot of what is reported as ufos are the same kind of effects.I do know what i saw that night and it was not anything i have ever seen sence then.I keep trying to find the answer to what i saw then,but i have not been able to in the past 33 years.

it moved in one direction and changed direction as soon as i looked at it.Like a baseball that changes it's path just infront of the batter.Then it was gone.I knew i had seen something special.I was just mad at my self for not getting a picture.
content.summary: Bright white ball of light passed over the beach

content.detailedDescription: I was camping with my father, sister, and a friend of hers. we were camping at the waters edge when we heard a rucus from across the lake, ( at that hour, sound carried well across the water).  we went out to investigate and saw a dark cigar shaped object blotting out the stars.  we were camping in a bay of the manmade lake (clark's hill).  this object moved from the north of the bay to the south of the bay without a sound.  it was somewhat verified by the exclaimations of the night fishermen across the lake.  noticeable on the craft was a bright red non-flashing light on the north side of the object and an irised open "spot-light"  at the southern end of it.  this light was focused on the water and held steady until it almost reached the opposite side of the bay, it then left quickly upwards at an angle.  there was not sound with it at all.  this happened quite a few years ago, but is true as best as i can recall the incedent.
content.summary: Oblong dark shape against stars above the lake

content.detailedDescription: We were putting together a xmas gift for the grandkids.A tramprleane.A strom was over and we were watching the clouds break up from time to time.They were moving vary fast.When another hole in the clouds opened up we were looking up,not all at once but when my daughter in law saw the object.We  looked up to see the clouds open a little and in the hole of the clouds was this object moving slow.High up but not to high to hide the fact,that it had no wings.No sound,plus it was moving at a course that if it was a blimp it was moving at stright line against the wind.I had a camer but i couldn't get it to foucus fast enough before it went back in the clouds.We knew what it was right away, a ufo.
content.summary: Right away we knew it had no wings.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east on interstate 90/94 north of madison, wi on the morning of december 19, 2006 around approximately 7:30 - 8:00 a.M.. it was a clear sunny day. there were many plane trails in the sky. but there was one large stationary tan object in the sky to the east of 90/94.  my friend said he thought maybe it was a star or a planet, but it looked nothing like a star.  it was very, very large in comparison to all the planes in the sky.  it looked like it could have been a blimp or a hot air balloon.  as we drove down the highway we were getting nearer and nearer the object until we were right next to it.  when we were next to it, it looked nothing like it had from a distance.  it looked like saturn with a ring of lights around it.  the ring of lights was white and pretty dim.  the area above and below the lights was very faint and greyish looking.  again it was very large.  we also saw 4 or 5 other unmoving objects in a variety of distances away from this large object.  suddenly the lights on the nearest large object just faded out.  but then one of the other unmoving objects became visible and it looked exactly like the one that disappeared and was just as large. it did the same thing.  it faded out from the position it was in, but i could see it or another object exactly like it to the north very faintly for awile after the 2nd one disappeared. this all took place in about a 30 minute time period.  i kept saying i wished i had binoculars and a video camera with me.  i have been travelling via car on the road for years because of my jobs and i have never seen anything like this. i am pretty positive that these were ufos. i am a sky watcher but am not sure what i saw.  the most compelling part about this to me is that from a distance it was tan, large roundish, ovalish and when we were right next to it, it didn't look like that at all.  it was not a plane, helicopter, hot air balloon, blimp, star or planet.  it was too sunny and clear of a day for me to be confused about what i saw.  i came to this sight because i felt sure there would have been many reportings about this that day.  i have not been able to get this off my mind since it happened.  i am 46 years old and have never experienced anything like this.  now i know why  they are called unidentified, because i do not know what i saw.  i just know that it was extraordinary.
content.summary: Witnessed a large unmoving object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on 166 hwy only a few mile from my home in chetopa ks, when a flash of light caught my attention to the north, i looked up into the sky and saw a large "wedge or v" shaped craft very high, moving very fast to the north. at first i thought it was just a really big airplane, then i noticed that it did not leave any contrail or other exhaust behind it. i pulled over to the side of the road and watched,two or three times i noticed the sun light would really gleam of it, no more than a total of 4 or 5 minutes, the craft moved into a large cloud bank where i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Driving home for the week end from work.

content.detailedDescription:
I had taken my mom home in my car.  as my mom was getting out of my car (she had been ill and i didn't want her to be in the cold night air too long) she looked at the night sky to the south-east and exclaimed "now i know that isn't a star.  look lia at the lights blinking so fast.  i then told her yes yes get in the house before you catch a cold of death.  my mom lives approx. 200 yrds west of my home.   i then drove back home to park the car and looked to the south-east toward gail oxford's home.  there above and south of her home was the blinking colored lights.   after watching the object for a few minutes we decided to call chuck reever.  

the object appeared to be approx 1 mile to 1.5 miles above the land.  with the naked eye i could see that it was blinking rapidly different colors, white blue green and red.  the object appeared to be the size of my small finger nail, approx. 1 mm in circumference.  i took the binoculars out to watch this object and to get a closer view.  the binoculars are 7x10 power.  even though i still could not see any clear difined shape, i could see that it was changing shape because of the way the lights would change their position.  the object changed from a veritcal line of lights to a half-circle, then went back to the vertical line.  i could not clearly see any shape of the object.  

i had to go into the house to get a paper and pen to write down the email address of ruben-state director of calif, mom came in and said excitedly that the object had sent out "flares".  she said it looked like it had spit out flares.  i then returned to the outside and watched it begin changing shape again with the lights.  it has now began to pulsate.  i ran into my home to get my husband's new digital-camera with a tlephoto 3x lens, and began to try to take photos of the object.  the object doesn't appear in any of the photos.  

after returning to my house and watching it from my kitchen window.  it has now moved to a postion of between gail's home and a tall tree norht of her home.  it now is approx 1/2 to 3/4 of a mile from land.

i left the window after watching the object for approx 10 minutes and returned to watch it again but the object was not in the sky where i had last seen it.  i went outside to search the sky and did not find it again.
content.summary: Fast blinking colored lights, lights were green, red, white, blue, object changed shaped fron elongated to half circle.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok...I will try one more time to attach the pictures that for some reason would not attach again in the previous 2nd follow-up report. if they do not attach this time, i will just send them in.

thanks!
patty donahue

content.summary: 3rd follow-up to previous incident on dec 2, 2006....Pictures of an object that starts as a tiny dot/speck...Then morphs into much larger object...

content.detailedDescription:
This is a follow-up to the incident i reported on 12-2-06. on this date, some object followed my daughters and i for over an hour, before a triangle appeared....This is our 4th triangle since feb 14, 2006. i tried to add these new pics (below) to cms database, but was unsuccessful. i also attempted to attach the actual video of the triangle, also with no success. i will file 2 seperate update reports with pictures...This one and one more. 

this new report has pictures of an object that i took pictures of earlier in the same day as the previously reported event. i will show the first picture here. in the next follow-up report, i will show how the object morphs/changes, from a tiny dot/speck...Into a large object.

1st picture...You will see a tiny dot in the sky...Original
2nd picture...Copy with object outlined
3rd picture...Cropped/zoomed copy

you may look up my previous report on the mufon cms database, 
for december 2, 2006....Under clinton county, michigan.

thanks!
patty donahue
mufon international fi &
michigan mufon fi (clinton county)
content.summary: 1st  follow-up with pictures of an object that starts as a tiny dot/speck...Then morphs into much larger object...2nd follow-up report of pics to follow...

content.detailedDescription:
24 oct 2003, 2020hrs. i was set up for stargazing @ the east gate of area 51, 2 miles from back gate. sitting in lawn chair facing south, with a great view 360* looked at my watch it was 2015 hrs. while sitting & facing south (no light out there)i seen a large fireball entering in the area of the constallation capricornus. fireball started out small orange ball then turn into a large bright ball of fire. then within 5 minutes another one did the same. both dimmed down to little lights going to the west. after that i was inlighted.  i know that it was a ufo. apon the sighting the objests did a waving moting while intering the atmostphere
~~~~ then go to a pinpoint light and went west and faded out.
content.summary: Two fireballs intering earths atmostphere (southwest) in capricornus

content.detailedDescription: My friends & i were hanging out together one night at the football field at our high school.  we were watching this "thing" in the sky that seemed to just stay in one place and change colors quickly from red to green to yellow, etc.  we sat on the bleechers & watched for a while and noted that there were about 5 helicopters and several airplanes flying around also.  surprisingly, this was one of the few nights of that summer that we were all sober, so i can't blame this on substance abuse!  we watched this "thing" in the sky for a while & were talking.  i'm not sure how much time passed (maybe an hour?) and then there was a craft hovering over the top of the football field right where we were.  it was probably no higher than the top of the high school which was four stories high and was about 30 yards long & the almost the width of the field.  it did not make any noise, it was the wierdest thing.  i think we were all in shock, so i'm not sure how long it hovered but when it took off again, it made maneuvers that we've never seem regular airplanes do.  then, the wierdest thing, about 2 soccer fields down there was a purple strobing light flashing for a while.  no idea what it was, but i remember getting freaked out when my boyfriend started walking towards it.  everyone kept saying it was just someone's tv, but it was so bright & fast i didn't think that was the case.  it flashed for about 2 mins and then just stopped.  after a while we walked down the field to where it would have been and didn't see anything (although it was dark out...).  we all know we witnessed something strange that night, but no one knows what.  we haven't talked about it since.  i wish i had reported earlier since almost 18 years have passed and i probably would have had more details before.'
content.summary: Looked like a dark-gray stingray in the sky with 3 red lights on the underside in the center of it

content.detailedDescription: When i was in the park for a walk then suddenlly a disc flew over my head then i called my friend over to the park then they shot mini misiles at us about 5 in.  and 4in. fat.Then my freind danny and me bought our paint ball guns then started shooting the ufo then it was going after us then we hid in  the boys bathroom. then i saw the ship door open then i went in then ran back out then shot the inside about 20 times tnen a alien came outthen i froze with fear.Then about 20 mins. later it left andten came back.5 mins later after it left other ufo'sabout 3 came and then while it left we started shooting the ufo.
content.summary: The ufo was parked in th park.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold clear night outside of washington d.C. i was sitting in my wheelchair on the deck of a friends house in landover md smoking a cigarette when i noticed an airliner making a final approach to land at national airport. it took the airliner a good minute to slowly cross my field of view . just as the airliner was out of site i noticed something above it moving in the opposite direction (west to east) it was 3 perfect triangles flying in a triangle formation. now that i think about it it could of been 1 object with 3 triangle lights. this object was moving at an unbelievable speed. in the minute it took the airliner to cross my field of view these lights shot across the sky in seconds from horizon to horizon and made no sound whatsoever. it felt like i just witnessed a ufo. how could anything move that fast across the sky. i told everyone in the house about it. but without seeing it yourself its hard to get the real sense of what happened.






attached is a drawing of what it looked like, the triangle lights moved west to east, the airliner moved east to west landing at national airport
content.summary: 3 triangle lights in unison speed across from horizon to horizon in 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
My mom was outside having a smoke and noticed an object that remained still.  a plane few by it and the object remained still.  

she was looking in the sky and noticed that it was not moving for quite a while.  she first thought it was a plane but realized it wasn't moving.

saw steady object with lights. seem to be bright one minute then dim another minute. seems to separte every minute. when separtes seems to be 2 separte lights.  can's identify due to be so far away. 

my mom was quite excited and her husband was quite distraut. he truely belives in ufos. he saw one when he was 16 years old in montreal around 12pm at night waiting for a bus. looked like a green light, ball shaped.

right at this moment it looks like it's moving away as if they know we are looking at them. we'll still looking at it for awhile and will report again in the late morning.
content.summary: Steady unidentified object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Watched as two lights approached me. 
high in the sky coming towards me from the west going due east.
they were exactly side by side.  (about a finger width apart)
when they reached just above me they split off in opposite directions. one going north and one going south. 
i followed the one going north with my eye until it was out of sight.
they were screaming across the sky, maybe 3 seconds for the whole sighting.
a good guess is 1000 mph. as fast as a shooting star. 
it came to me that they were probes. checking on earth for what. 
either it is for our good or theirs. 
unless they come to my door for tea i can only speculate but there is some known facts. for one....We humans do not have anything that does this.
  vivian the amphibian 
www.Theyukontapes.Com
content.summary: Very fast moving light make 180' turns
